name: Rari
intro: A suite of decentralized finance products
introduce: Rari Capital is a suite of decentralized finance (DeFi) products consists of Yield aggregator, Fuse, Tranches. Yield aggregator offers several liquidity pools , users deposit the supported token, and in return receive an interest-generating token. Rari’s yield aggregator automatically searches for the highest yield through a collection of safety-assessed DeFi lending protocols, and users can withdraw their funds at into any of Rari’s supported assets. Fuse is an open interest rate protocol that allows users to lend and borrow digital assets peer to peer (P2P). The Fuse protocol enables anyone to instantly create and deploy their own lending and borrowing pool.
